CustomField.description: CF - Reasons for requiring intensive support
CustomField.inlineHelpText: CF - Reasons for requiring intensive support
CustomField.label: Reasons for Requiring Intensive Support

value.fullName: Isolation or no support person (e.g. carer, family or representative) who they are comfortable to act on their behalf and/or who is willing and able to support them to access aged care services via My Aged Care.
value.label: Isolation or no support person (e.g. carer, family or representative) who they are comfortable to act on their behalf and/or who is willing and able to support them to access aged care services via My Aged Care.

value.fullName: Communication barriers, including limited literacy skills.
value.label: Communication barriers, including limited literacy skills.

value.fullName: Difficulty processing information to make decisions.
value.label: Difficulty processing information to make decisions.

value.fullName: Resistance to engage with aged care for any reason and their safety is at immediate risk or they may end up in a crisis situation within (approximately) the next year.
value.label: Resistance to engage with aged care for any reason and their safety is at immediate risk or they may end up in a crisis situation within (approximately) the next year.

value.fullName: Past experiences that mean they are hesitant to engage with aged care, institutions or government.
value.label: Past experiences that mean they are hesitant to engage with aged care, institutions or government.
